title: Tokyo Driftnet
imgSmText: A drone racer must transport a vital organ across Tokyo in one hour.
imgText: When a Yakuza boss needs an emergency transplant, a disgraced former drone delivery racer must use his skills to get the organ across the city before time runs out.

title: Moscow Meltdown
imgSmText: A nuclear engineer must prevent a reactor meltdown in a besieged Moscow.
imgText: During a sudden military coup, a foreign engineer becomes the only person who can prevent a catastrophic nuclear meltdown at a power plant under artillery fire.

title: Cairo Chase
imgSmText: A relic hunter uses a vintage car to escape mercenaries across Cairo.
imgText: After finding a priceless artifact, a hunter is betrayed and must use his deep knowledge of Cairo's backstreets and his classic car to escape a ruthless private army.

title: The Berlin Exchange
imgSmText: A spy must escort a defector during a city-wide blackout in Berlin.
imgText: An MI6 agent's extraction of a high-value defector goes wrong when a cyberattack plunges Berlin into darkness, turning the city into a hunting ground.

title: Rio Siege
imgSmText: Ex-special forces must defend a favela from an invading militia.
imgText: When a private militia lays siege to a Rio de Janeiro favela to control its drug trade, a retired soldier living there must lead his neighbors in a desperate defense.

title: The Mumbai Run
imgSmText: A courier runs a non-stop gauntlet through Mumbai's streets.
imgText: A street-smart courier accepts a simple delivery, not knowing the package makes him a target for every gang in the city. He must run, climb, and fight to survive.

title: Arctic Fire
imgSmText: Oil rig workers fight for survival after a mysterious attack.
imgText: A crew on a remote Arctic drilling platform is attacked by highly trained saboteurs. They must use their engineering skills and grit to retake the rig.

title: Sydney Standoff
imgSmText: A hacker must defend a data center from a physical assault.
imgText: A cyber-security expert trapped in a Sydney data center must use the building's smart systems as weapons when a heavily armed team breaches it to steal data.

title: The Parisian Run
imgSmText: A bomb disposal expert must transport a live device across Paris.
imgText: After a failed defusal, an expert must carry a volatile, motion-sensitive bomb to a secure location, turning the streets of Paris into a deadly obstacle course.

title: Seoul Surge
imgSmText: A disgraced pilot must make an emergency landing in downtown Seoul.
imgText: After a missile cripples his plane, a pilot must navigate the dense cityscape of Seoul to find a place to land, with thousands of lives in the balance.

title: The Nairobi Extraction
imgSmText: A private security team extracts a CEO from a hotel under siege.
imgText: When a terrorist group takes over a luxury hotel, a small, elite team is sent in to rescue a specific high-value target before a full-scale assault begins.

title: Istanbul Intrigue
imgSmText: A historian uses ancient secrets to survive a modern conspiracy.
imgText: An academic specializing in Ottoman history discovers a modern plot hidden in an ancient map and must use his knowledge of the city's secrets to stay alive.

title: The Bangkok Protocol
imgSmText: An assassin must complete a hit during a chaotic Songkran festival.
imgText: A contract killer has one chance to eliminate his target during Thailand's Songkran water festival, using the chaos as cover for the perfect shot.

title: The Dubai Drop
imgSmText: A high-stakes heist takes place during a sandstorm in Dubai.
imgText: A crew uses a massive sandstorm as cover to break into a secure vault at the top of the world's tallest building, but the storm traps them inside.

title: The Mexico City Metro
imgSmText: A federal agent pursues a cartel boss through the subway system.
imgText: An honest federal agent corners a cartel leader deep in the labyrinthine Mexico City metro, leading to a cat-and-mouse chase through tunnels and stations.

title: The Amsterdam Heist
imgSmText: A thief uses the canal system to escape after a museum robbery.
imgText: After stealing a priceless painting, a master thief uses his knowledge of Amsterdam's canals and bridges to evade a relentless Interpol agent on his tail.

title: The Cairo Convey
imgSmText: A convoy must cross a war-torn city to deliver aid.
imgText: A private military company must escort a humanitarian aid convoy through a factional civil war in a future Cairo, facing ambushes at every turn.

title: The Reykjavik Run
imgSmText: A courier must deliver a package across a frozen Iceland.
imgText: A courier carrying a mysterious package must cross the volatile, glacial terrain of Iceland, pursued by a well-equipped team that will stop at nothing to intercept it.

title: The Lagos Siege
imgSmText: A former soldier defends a market from a rogue military unit.
imgText: When a corrupt army unit attempts to seize control of a major Lagos market, a former soldier who runs a stall there must organize the vendors to fight back.

title: The Manila Storm
imgSmText: A fisherman must rescue his family during a catastrophic typhoon.
imgText: As a super-typhoon floods Manila, a humble fisherman uses his intimate knowledge of the waterways to navigate the submerged city and save his family from their rooftop.
